alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:20PM MST until February 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, particularly near Hellgate Canyon. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
